column5:
Download IFTF Vantage Playbook on strategic foresight:

https://t.co/DDXL0WXtND
No future is unimaginable to us! thank you @avantgame #fixthefuture
presenting @IFTF 20220-2032 Map of the Decade, Leading-Edge Behaviors today. thanks to @bkreit and @vanessamason we wish you were here
What if we rejected the individualistic pursuit of self-improvement/well-being and shifted focus to the systems that are producing poor human health? #fixthefuture
What if we stopped monetizing time and valued being "slow"? #fixthefuture
What if we redefined success by scaling deep instead of scaling wide?#fixthefuture
What if we stopped using GDP for measuring the well-being of an economy? #fixthefuture
What if let go the logic of efficiency? #fixthefuture
What if we became nocturnals to avoid the heat? #fixthefuture
What if we viewed and accounted for trees as a universal basic asset? #fixthefuture

What if jobs were better and not health extractive?
#fixthefuture
What if we could live near work?#fixthefuture
